name: StateFacts
0:
”Alexa, open State Facts”
”Alexa, start State Facts”
”Alexa, launch State Facts”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: state facts
des:
The purpose of this skill is to help children and adults become more familiar with the United States. The randomized nature of the facts allows everyone to learn and think, and not get bored with the same mundane facts.

Ask Alexa for a State Fact and it will tell you a fun fact about one of the American states. Use it to start the day in your household, classroom, and more!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
